title: Lamborghini bets big on India's long-term potential
description: Lamborghini projected significant growth in India, with the potential to be a top market in the Asia Pacific region. The company sold a record 103 units in 2023 and aims for 150 annual sales by 2026. India has the youngest customers worldwide, with an average age below 40, and benefits from growing infrastructure and a thriving start-up culture.
